comment: солдат.  после реплики один из солдатов бьет рабочего и тот падает на колени

languages.text: "Значит, ты еще и сомневаешься в справедливости законов Империума? Берите его!"

traits.locale_text: "Значит, ты еще и сомневаешься в справедливости законов Империума? Берите его, парни".

languages.text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"
languages.original_text: "Значит, ты еще и сомневаешься в справедливости законов Империума? Берите его!"

traits.locale_text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"
"So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

"So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

languages.text: “好啊，你也在质疑帝国的法律，对不对？给我抓住他！”
languages.original_text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

traits.locale_text: “好啊，你也在质疑帝国的法律，对不对？给我抓住他！”

languages.text: 「お前、帝国の法の公平さを信じられないのか？こいつを捕まえろ！」
languages.original_text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前、帝国の法の公平さを信じられないのか？こいつを捕まえろ！」

languages.text: «¿Ahora también te atreves a cuestionar la justicia de las leyes del Imperium? ¡Cogedle!».
languages.original_text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ahora también te atreves a cuestionar la justicia de las leyes del Imperium? ¡Cogedle!».

languages.text: "Ach, jetzt hinterfragt Ihr also die Fairness der Gesetze des Imperiums? Ergreift ihn!"
languages.original_text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, jetzt hinterfragt Ihr also die Fairness der Gesetze des Imperiums? Ergreift ihn!"

languages.text: « Donc vous remettez en question l'impartialité des lois de l'Imperium ? Saisissez-le ! »
languages.original_text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

traits.locale_text: « Donc vous remettez en question l'impartialité des lois de l'Imperium ? Saisissez-le ! »

languages.text: "Şimdi de İmparatorluk'un kanunlarının doğruluğunu mu sorguluyorsun? Yakalayın şunu!"
languages.original_text: "So now you're also questioning the fairness of the Imperium's laws? Grab him!"

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi de İmparatorluk'un kanunlarının doğruluğunu mu sorguluyorsun? Yakalayın onu!"
